scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:app" "npm run dev:dashboard"
scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd api && npm install" "cd app && npm install" "cd auth && npm install" "cd dashboard && npm install"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "cd api && npm run build" "cd app && npm run build" "cd auth && npm run build" "cd dashboard && npm run build"
